etymology.description: 中正 (eponym) + 区 (district) = the Zhongzheng administrative district of Taipei.
etymology.interpretation: Taipei administrative district named after Chiang Kai-shek’s courtesy name “Zhongzheng.” Combines the eponym with the administrative suffix 区.
etymology.simplification: 區 → 区 was simplified by component reduction in PRC orthography; 中正 is unchanged. Taiwan uses 中正區 (trad.), while simplified contexts write 中正区.

parts.english: Zhongzheng (proper name); courtesy name of Chiang Kai-shek; upright and impartial (literal)

examples.chinese: 中正区在台北市的中心(中正區在臺北市的中心)。
examples.pinyin: Zhōngzhèng Qū zài Táiběi Shì de zhōngxīn.
examples.english: Zhongzheng District is in the center of Taipei City.

examples.chinese: 这里有总统府和中正纪念堂(這裡有總統府和中正紀念堂)。
examples.pinyin: Zhèlǐ yǒu Zǒngtǒngfǔ hé Zhōngzhèng Jìniàntáng.
examples.english: The Presidential Office and the Chiang Kai-shek Memorial Hall are here.

examples.chinese: 中正区是重要的行政与文化区(中正區是重要的行政與文化區)。
examples.pinyin: Zhōngzhèng Qū shì zhòngyào de xíngzhèng yǔ wénhuà qū.
examples.english: Zhongzheng is an important administrative and cultural district.
